CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 is obtained for PCDSeBT - based PSCs , to our knowledge , which is among the highest short - circuit current density ( J SC ) values obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| PCDTBT |
| PCBM |

I removed "short-circuit current density" and "BHJ device" as they are not material names, but rather a property and a device type, respectively.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 is obtained for PCDSeBT - based PSCs , to our knowledge , which is among the highest short - circuit current density ( J SC ) values obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| short-circuit current density (JSC) |
| high current |

The two property names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. short-circuit current density (JSC)
2. high current

Note that "high current" is not a specific property name, but rather a descriptive term used to characterize the value of the current. The actual property name being referred to is short-circuit current density (JSC).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| short-circuit current density (JSC) |

The paragraph mentions only one material property, which is short-circuit current density (JSC).

2. J SC (short-circuit current density)
3. 6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) (a material used in the fabrication of BHJ devices)
